DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate efficacy secukinumab 300 mg Week 16 superior placebo adult patient active PsA base proportion patient achieve American College Rheumatology 20 ( ACR20 ) response .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Secukinumab 300 mg 150 mg Adult Patients With Active Psoriatic Arthritis ( PsA ) After 16 Weeks Treatment Compared Placebo
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female patient least 18 year age Diagnosis PsA classify CASPAR criterion symptoms least 6 month moderate severe PsA must Baseline ≥3 tender joint 78 ≥3 swell 76 ( dactylitis digit count one joint ) Rheumatoid factor and/or antiCCP antibody negative screen A target skin psoriatic lesion PASI score 1 great Chest Xray evidence ongoing infectious malignant process Patients ever receive biologic immunomodulating agent include target TNFα , IL6 IL12/23 investigational approve
